title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) and no busy cursor is displayed.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, it should take a reasonable amount of time and a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the ongoing process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the table.
2. Update the checked state of one or more checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the time it takes to update and the absence of a busy cursor.
